oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Airplane view of A. & I. State College, Nashville, Tenn., between 1930 and 1945
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Tennessee Agricultural and Industrial State College campus. This school was established in 1912 for the higher education of African American youth. Today the school is known as Tennessee State University. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee Agricultural and Industrial State College--Buildings; Tennessee State University--Buildings
